COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9c
STRING: The towel was in the entryway like always.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8
STRING: Phorni must have left it for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb4
STRING: I wiped my hair and started playing the Fortelle to kill
time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca
STRING: My interest wasn't piqued yet, but I almost couldn't feel
my exhaustion.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe0
STRING: I didn't think Phorni would appear until Torta came, and
she showed no signs of coming out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6
STRING: Having a talk was certainly important to Torta and me,
but for someone uninvolved, it might be pretty
annoying.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x146
STRING: I was really tired, so I lay down on the bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x15c
STRING: I hadn't planned to, but I ended up falling asleep for a
little while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x168
STRING: It was dark outside, and I could tell quite a bit of time
had passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17e
STRING: I checked the clock and saw it was past nine o'clock in
the evening.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x18a
STRING: Four hours had already passed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x196
STRING: I thought I'd eat dinner with Torta, so I hadn't eaten
anything, but it was already too late to ask her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ac
STRING: Even if I wanted to eat out, after nine o'clock most of
the shops would be closed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c2
STRING: Also, why was she so late?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ce
STRING: Maybe she was waiting for something, or she was
confused.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: Though it was true that we hadn't agreed on a time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1e6
STRING: But something was strange.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2aa
STRING: I started to think about leaving to get Torta at her
house, when there was suddenly a knock at the door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2c0
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... She was just a little late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2d6
STRING: It wasn't late enough to be angry at her, but I felt
relieved for the moment, and went to meet her at the
door.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x306
STRING: [Chris] “You're late. What were you doing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x338
STRING: [???] “Chris... Do you know who I am?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x34e
STRING: She said this at the same time I opened the door, but
the person standing there wasn't Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x364
STRING: [Chris] “Arietta...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x382
STRING: Why... Why was she here?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x38e
STRING: Not Torta...

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3b6
STRING: [Arie] “Sorry... I came to see you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3cc
STRING: Arie said this after a long silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3d8
STRING: [Chris] “When...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3f6
STRING: [Arie] “Just now.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x40c
STRING: [Chris] “Oh... Right... But why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x43e
STRING: [Arie] “I wanted to make sure of one thing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x454
STRING: I was stunned at the suddenness of it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x460
STRING: It reminded me of how Arie appeared suddenly at New
Year's like this, too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x476
STRING: But the situation was totally different now.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x482
STRING: [Chris] “How about Torta? Did you go see her?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a0
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah... I saw her, and we talked.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b6
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4cc
STRING: Just what did Arie and Torta talk about?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4d8
STRING: And I wondered why Arie was here and Torta wasn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x50a
STRING: [Arie] “You wrote it in your last letter, didn't you? That
you like Torta... But you like me, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x52a
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x548
STRING: [Arie] “Now, do you feel the same with me right in front
of you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x55e
STRING: I was at a loss for words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56a
STRING: I wondered what I should say in this situation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x576
STRING: What I had to say was decided.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x582
STRING: I took some time, and answered her properly.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x598
STRING: [Chris] “Arie, I'm sorry... I still feel the same.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ca
STRING: [Arie] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5e0
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5f6
STRING: The words caught in my throat and wouldn't come out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x602
STRING: I didn't know what to do after this.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x60e
STRING: But Arie simply nodded, as if to erase the problem.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x640
STRING: [Arie] “Then I have to go home soon. The last train
home will be leaving.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x660
STRING: [Chris] “You're not staying at Ninna's house?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x692
STRING: [Arie] “I have to work tomorrow. I don't have the time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6a8
STRING: [Chris] “Oh...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6c6
STRING: [Arie] “Bye, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6dc
STRING: [Chris] “It's already late, so I'll walk you to the station.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x70e
STRING: [Arie] “Uh-uh. Do that with Torta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x724
STRING: [Chris] “No... Let me do that much. Please.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x73a
STRING: Natale and the New Year had already passed, and quiet
had returned to the city.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x750
STRING: Even so, I couldn't let her walk alone at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x75c
STRING: Breaking up suddenly in the form of a letter still didn't
feel real anyway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x772
STRING: Even if we were headed for a breakup, we needed to
talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x788
STRING: We both probably needed closure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x794
STRING: Regardless, we needed to talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7bc
STRING: [Arie] “Alright...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d2
STRING: [Chris] “Thank you, but wait just a minute.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7e8
STRING: I had Arie wait in the entryway, pulled a piece of music
paper out of my bag and left a short note for Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7fe
STRING: I put it on the table where it would be easy to see, and
headed for the entryway.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x814
STRING: “To Torta. I'll be right back, please wait here.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x856
STRING: After we got out of the alleys and made it to the main
road, it was a straight, roofed-in road to the train
station.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x86c
STRING: As we left the Old District and entered the New District,
there was only one route over land.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x882
STRING: [Chris] “Arie... I'm really sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8b4
STRING: [Arie] “Why are you apologizing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ca
STRING: [Chris] “I was the one who said I liked you... And this is
how it ends...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x906
STRING: [Arie] “Then it's the same.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: Arie said those words over top of my own.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x928
STRING: [Chris] “The same...?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x946
STRING: [Arie] “I was the one who broke up with you. You don't
have anything to worry about, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x966
STRING: [Chris] “But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x998
STRING: [Arie] “It's fine. Let's just talk about old times. This talk...
Is kind of hard for me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9b8
STRING: [Chris] “Got it... If that's what you want, Arie.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9ea
STRING: [Arie] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa00
STRING: Arie spoke cheerfully.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa0c
STRING: But I felt like she was forcing it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa18
STRING: I tried to hear her voice better, but the sound of the rain
on the roof was strong, and I could only hear her
sporadically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa4a
STRING: [Arie] “We've been together ever since we were little.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa60
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa76
STRING: I wondered if Arie really wanted to talk about old times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa82
STRING: Even talk of old memories would just be talk of the
past, filled with regret.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa98
STRING: If Arie still wanted to hear it, I had to answer her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaca
STRING: [Arie] “When was it... That you realized we were two
different people?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaea
STRING: [Chris] “We? Different?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb1c
STRING: [Arie] “We're twins, so most people thought we were
almost the same. Even we thought the two of us were
one person.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb46
STRING: Torta said the same thing at some point.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb52
STRING: Then she said that was starting to change.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: [Arie] “We each had things we were lacking, and the
other would make up for it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb6
STRING: [Arie] “But that has changed... And you're the reason,
Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbd6
STRING: [Chris] “I am...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc08
STRING: [Arie] “You're the one that separated us, Chris... Of
course that's besides Mom, Dad, and Grandma.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc44
STRING: [Arie] “The first person to see us as different people
outside of our family was you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc64
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc9e
STRING: The look of the town changed as we walked and
talked, and now we only had a little time left.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcd0
STRING: [Arie] “You always understood us, Chris. Even if we
changed clothes or our hair, you never mixed up our
names.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcfa
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd10
STRING: Arie and Torta used to play pranks like that a lot.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1c
STRING: Even so, the twins' parents and I could always tell them
apart.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd32
STRING: I never really knew why.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3e
STRING: But I just knew that Arie was Arie and Torta was Torta.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd70
STRING: [Arie] “And then... You chose one of us, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xda8
STRING: There was a hush over the station at night.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdb4
STRING: A place just off the main road.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdc0
STRING: In the middle of the rain-soaked street, we stood and
had our last conversation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf2
STRING: [Arie] “I... I'm going to go.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe08
STRING: [Chris] “Right...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe3a
STRING: [Arie] “Can I say one last thing?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe50
STRING: [Chris] “Yeah.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe82
STRING: [Arie] “If you change your mind, can you call my name?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xea2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh...? What... What does that mean?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed4
STRING: [Arie] “The train is going to leave soon. I have to go...
Through those gates.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xef4
STRING: Arie pointed to the gates of the station.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1c
STRING: [Arie] “If you call my name while I'm walking over
there... I'll turn around and run back to you.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf58
STRING: [Arie] “It only has to be once, before you completely
lose sight of me.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa0
STRING: Arie said this and started walking slowly, not waiting for
my words.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb6
STRING: “Arietta.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfc2
STRING: But I couldn't call that name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfce
STRING: Her back was still very near me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfda
STRING: There were many chances to call her name.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe6
STRING: But I just watched her silently.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xff2
STRING: I imagined myself calling her name many times.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xffe
STRING: And Arie's happy face as she ran to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x100a
STRING: But I didn't actually open my mouth even once. I
protected my silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x104a
STRING: She turned around and looked at me just once.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1056
STRING: Our gazes met and she was the one who turned away.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1062
STRING: I lost sight of her from behind, and then I started
walking back to my apartment.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1078
STRING: There was another person waiting for me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1084
STRING: [Chris] “Tortinita...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x109a
STRING: That was the name of the person more important to me
than anybody.
